name: peaq
description: peaq is the home of DePIN and the world's largest and fastest-growing DePIN ecosystem. It is a Layer-1 blockchain designed to be the best possible backbone for DePINs (real-world apps) and is home to more than 30 applications in 17 industries and to the 1,000,000+ devices, vehicles, machines, and robots (Machine RWAs) that run on them.
